## Skill Information
- Skill ID: [e.g. golang-best-practices]
- Skill Version: [e.g. 1.0.0]
- Skill Source: [e.g. built-in, custom repository, URL]

## Feedback Type
- [ ] Bug in skill content
- [ ] Missing information
- [ ] Outdated information
- [ ] Improvement suggestion
- [ ] Compatibility issue
- [ ] Other

## Detailed Feedback
Describe your feedback in detail:

### What works well
- [List what you like about the skill]

### What needs improvement
- [List specific issues or areas for improvement]

### Specific examples
Provide specific examples of problematic content or suggested improvements:

```yaml
# Current content (if applicable)
...

# Suggested improvement
...
```

## Impact
Describe how this affects your workflow:
- [e.g. Causes confusion, leads to incorrect code, missing best practices]

## Environment
- Target Tool: [e.g. Cursor, Claude Code, OpenCode]
- Project Type: [e.g. Go web service, React app, Python library]
- Skill Variables Used: [e.g. project_name=myapp, use_viper=true]

## Additional Context
Add any other context about the feedback, such as:
- Related skills
- Workarounds you're currently using
- References to documentation or standards

## Checklist
- [ ] I have verified the skill content
- [ ] I have tested with different variables
- [ ] I have checked for skill updates
- [ ] This feedback is specific and actionable
